def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Calculate the absolute differences between Left-Weight and Right-Distance, 
    Left-Distance and Right-Weight, and add them to the DataFrame.
    
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    New Feature 2: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Weight)
    New Feature 3: combined_difference | combined_difference = abs((Left-Weight + Left-Distance) - (Right-Weight + Right-Distance))
    """
    
    # Create a copy of the input DataFrame to avoid modifying it directly
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight, 
    # between Left-Distance and Right-Weight, and combined differences
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    df_output['combined_difference'] = abs((df_output['Left-Weight'] + df_output['Left-Distance']) - (df_output['Right-Weight'] + df_output['Right-Distance']))
    
    return df_output
